table.name: vtiger_address
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_address` ( `addressid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `addressno` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `reference` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `street` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `pobox` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `city` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `state` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `postalcode` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, `country` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`addressid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_addresscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_addresscf` ( `addressid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`addressid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
